sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import Style from "./homeCard.module.css"; import ProfilePic from "../../assets/images/profilePic.png"; import PieGraph from "../../assets/svg/pieGraph.svg"; import moment from 'moment' function HomeCard(prop) { const dateString = '2020-09-11T04:00:00.672Z' const formatDate = (dateString) => { const options = { year: "numeric", month: "long", day: "numeric" } return new Date(dateString).toLocaleDateString(undefined, options) } const formatTime=(dateString)=>{ const local = moment.utc(dateString).local().format("HH:mm A"); return local; } console.log(formatTime(dateString)); let userData=prop.obj.user_id; let vehicleData=userData?userData.vehicles[0]:"" return ( <>
{userData?userData.username:""}
{userData?userData.email:""}
Reg Number:
{userData?userData.vehicles[0].registration_number:""}
Vehicle Model:
{vehicleData.year?vehicleData.year.year:""}
Time:
09:30Am to 10:00Am
Phone:
{userData?userData.phone:""}
Status
Booked
Cancel
) } export default HomeCard
